name: Cave Run Kids 2
description:
Controls:

PC:

Left/Right Arrow - Left moves left player, right moves right.

A/D J/L - A and D move left player, J and L move right.

Mobile:

Touch - Left side of screen for left player, right for right.

Notes:

Run through the cave grabbing as much treasure as you can. The deeper you get the more valuable the treasure you'll find. Dodge the traps and monsters found trhoughout the cave.

This game is still in a very early stage of development, and so there will likely be many bugs.
